Tests that portals are rendered inline.


Running: testSetUp

Running: testRemove
- <html>
      <head></head>
    - <body>
        - <div>
            - <portal src="http://devtools.oopif.test:8000/devtools/oopif/resources/empty.html">
                + #document
              </portal>
          </div>
      </body>
  </html>
